lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

And then he destroys everything, don't you think Vokodo would come out and be like, "What the shit?!" And he would try to attack the thing that was attacking him? lines.text: I really want to put you in that position.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no, don't listen to Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a family at home that you need to think about as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do, but right now "I have a family I've made here on this island "that I still feel responsible for."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You consider us a family that fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But there are many good people here, "at least good for the time that I've known them, "and I don't want them damned to this life without choice."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They say the V.O. community is full of some of the best people you will find.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know we have two entrances and we had talked about coming in from two different sides, or do we want to hedge our bets, or not hedge our bets, and go in through one? Do we want to split up and come in from that...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I feel like if he can really see us at all times, which I guess he can, it's not like we can hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't sneak up on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do any of you all have any type of magic that would help with that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I genuinely don't know how he's doing this, so I don't have anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, I can turn invisible for a short time, but I don't know if he can see our essence or hear us or feel us, or...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We believe he cannot hear us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of us can become invisible, correct?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you go invisible tonight and see if you still feel that tingling sensation like you're being watched?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you do it before? You did it already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I was invisible for a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sensation of proximity, being watched, did not diminish when you were invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, either way, shouldn't we be near the ships for when the dragon--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because Dieter is either coming or not, and if he comes and wrecks things and we are lucky enough to have Vokodo leave his lair and exit, if we are not there, then we're not going to be able to take advantage of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How would Vokodo leave? Through the tunnel, the first entrance that we went through? The ship entrance? Or is he going to...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, if he flees his lair...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he climbs up and out of the volcano and he comes out the top of it? How cool would that be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not going to set off a tremendous volcanic explosion and kill everyone on the island, are we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have no way to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I suppose if he flees through the first entrance we went through and we're at the ship tunnels, then he would be on the other side of the mountain, and we wouldn't really be able to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, does Vokodo even care about the ships?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he does in terms of keeping people on the island, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But why not just destroy them instead of hoarding them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He won't want to see them destroyed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably the only reason he does not have them in his chamber with him is because of their size, so he has them as close as possible, perhaps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seems like the best bet, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, if we stay at that end, see if we can get the dragon turtle in the cave, doing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then we can come in once that starts going down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And maybe if he doesn't come out, Vokodo isn't lured out, maybe then we can make the dragon turtle smaller and send him further up the bloodstream, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's insane, but it could work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So maybe we make our way there tonight, and we camp on ships towards the rear of the impound lot near the entrance to the butthole?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And time permitting, maybe we could even, if there's room in that vast cavern where the ships were, maybe we could sort of hide one off to the side for ourself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hums) I would recommend we not be seen staging the territory, so to speak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We also have to control the water long enough to get a ship, a big ship, through, and not have the spell falter because then, goodbye ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then, let's just get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I gather we'll take a tree "nearby where we camped the night before?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a walled tunnel of smooth wood where you can see the striations and rings on the interior of the tree, and on the other side, white beach and an ocean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. Go, go, go, go, go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought she was full of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just as you all emerge and you watch Vilya escape, (whooshing) it closes behind her and just the tree trunk of one of the palms there is left like nothing had happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is a very cool trick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would happen if you were halfway through the tree when it closed? Would you get cut in half?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just mummified in the tree? Petrified?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha was on the same page, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we ever take a short rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not since you left the Ruin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what other preparations do we need? Do we need to go into the cavern and sort of get a lay of the land, figure out where we're going to be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything changed from the last time that we were here that we can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception or investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nothing seems to be disturbed beyond the tracks you left when you made your way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This could be where you set up the Welcome to Traveler Con.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Show up and give everybody a badge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't control the water to get back into the cavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys heading back to the falls, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should just look like we're sheltering for the night, and then maybe thinking of coming to give him an offering or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go back in there, Caduceus, will you be able to control your urges to swim down and through?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do what you have to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could tie a rope around each other, you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So we're sleeping, if one goes, we all go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When has that never not worked out? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approaching, as you get closer and closer to it, the water itself still firing up with the same intensity that it previously has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have use of Control Water, you said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I point out to Fjord where he should do it so that it does the least amount of damage to us as we go through it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And do you split it? Do you put it off to the left or right? You just stopped it entirely? What did you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That might be easier, I'm not sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I only can do it one time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just try it from the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Side, yeah. So I'll walk up and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Literally try and shift so that one side becomes open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does, you can now see the wetted cliff-side atop that is left to glisten under the sun, and the water is now firing off and spraying somewhere in the jungle down the southern side of where it once was, and you can see now the cliff-face behind it is now exposed and seemingly safe to traverse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere there's a very soggy tyrannosaurus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all take a wide berth to not be pulled into the rapid current that is immediately around where it's breaking the water's surface.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it? Still afternoon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just say the things you want to do and then continue from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was getting evening by the time it was ending the last time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we want to set up a hidey spot on anywhere in here, or...?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should take a walk about and look around a little bit more, and maybe figure out if there's a place that...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all water, right? Is there a walkway around the perimeter, or...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get up against the wall and it'll keep you there, but it's a decline and it slips the further out you go immediately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could just hang out on Eden's Horizon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that wasn't too close, where we were feeling the pull, right? Still safe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not right when you come in, though, because if Dieter does come in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to be on the ship he sees first, you know what I mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's, like, halfway through the cavern itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is also the question is, if we go into the cavern, how are we going to find our way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One of us will have to be taken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we've just got to let it happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we just follow whoever fails.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it disappears when you get close to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it just takes you to the chamber, that's all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll also need to breathe underwater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone have a bunch of rope?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a few of us do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, I'm actually missing a lot of things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So shall we just feast and sleep, or is there more planning that we need to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (exhales) Sure feels like there's more we need to do, doesn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything changes if Dieter does not come.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also have to survive our sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And see if we all remember who we are, and deal with that if it is a problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get some more gold dust ready just in case somebody does need help in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he's been watching us and we've been traveling all over the island and he's clocking us as a threat, we are pretty close to where he is, just on the off-chance that he's like, "Oh, I'm going to go get them while they sleep."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, we're going to be sleeping in a bubble, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it does not go all the way around, but...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, he could come up from underneath, because it is a boat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then when the moment happens, either here in the shipyard, or in Vokodo's lair, we will try to send him away, no? So you all have to keep him busy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As long as I can get up to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can-- I have a spell for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the two clerics, how much diamond dust do you still have left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it diamond dust that we need?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or gold dust? Okay, it's diamond dust?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Diamond dust for the Greater Restoration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me look at my diamonds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of us fail tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vilya, checking in, says, "I only have components for one more casting myself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a 300 gold diamond and a 500 gold diamond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. But we have to pulverize?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need to pulverize it somehow, or...?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have any more diamond as well, or...?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't, but I have a substitute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can pulverize a gem in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can just take the night to file one down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I say we destroyed one of the diamonds, the 300 gold diamond, you cast Greater Restoration how many times the last time? Did you cast it twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you also cast it on Vilya, so it's four times it's been used.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we can say that Caleb would've powdered them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much residuum do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's seven casts, as long as somebody--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Residuum can be used to replace any sort of material component cost of equal cost, but only if they have it on their person to use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll give 400 to you, Jester, and 300 to you, Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just giving away all my shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I really want it back, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I don't think that's how it works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pop someone back to life if something bad happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a 300 diamond and a 500 gold diamond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I've got 300 gold worth of residuum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have the plans for the American war base as well? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's what we're going to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast twice, so I would have 100.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 50 diamond if someone grinds them down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the deck of this here ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, describe how you set your Heroes' Feast out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use some of my blue fabric to set up picnic blankets all over the deck, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want some mushrooms or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can eat pancakes. Pancakes are fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I figure some pocket bacon for Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some weird-looking bug sort of things for Yasha, just because they're interesting-looking, but really they taste like chocolate.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It has a little bit of a kick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, unicorn whipped cream sort of stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're more pastel sort of shades.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want anything more substantial, or is this good?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give everyone stomach aches before we go in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a cucumber salad. He likes dill, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's one teeny, tiny bowl of cucumber salad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and some nuts, because that's what Sprinkle likes to eat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought Sprinkle liked to eat shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see from underneath the shawl that Jester wears, this small, skittering weasel head slowly peers out-- (squeaks and hisses) And just withdraws back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Jester, as you finish your invocation, you set, amongst this blue sheet that you've laid out here on the deck--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it spills over, it actually forms a red tablecloth around the sides of it, so overtaking the green you put down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, everybody gets their own teacup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks delicious, it smells delicious, and everything seems to have this faintly glowing hue to it that's slightly off-putting, but still, the other senses tell you this is an invitation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there enough for Vilya as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinkle gets some. Everybody gets some.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is delicious, it is invigorating, and for the next 24 hours...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on wisdom saving throws, you are immune to poison and everyone gains-- is it 2d10 temporary hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll that now, Jester, if you don't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's rolling for us, or we roll--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She rolls, and then everybody gets the same number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a comfortable meal in your belly and the surge of divine energy flowing through you, protecting you, you get the after-meal sleepies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, also immune to fear. Useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, wait, it's immune to fear, poison...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you feeling about Traveler Con? You know, if we defeat the looming volcano god that has this entire island held hostage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what to do about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like, whether or not to have it? Or what to do when you do have it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was hoping maybe we will fight Vokodo and then everything will just become clear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You seemed sad last night after you went off and talked to him for a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, it's just-- it's stressful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if it were just you and him, like your old days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just don't know what that means for everyone else, you know, all the people that are coming here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he said he doesn't want to be a god, did he say why he's still having everyone come here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he know about this place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be really stressful, you know, to have all these people constantly praying to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am very not trying to overstep at all, but him knowing that he would bring people here, that it's possible that they would forget?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't mean anything to us, but the ant is real sad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you talked to him at all about going back to just the way things were when you were little, just he and you, as friends?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before, he used to be here all the time, you know? Ugh, it's so hard to share. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is going to be here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But all those people are already on their way here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't seem, like you said, the most considerate thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but also, it is complicated sometimes, extracting yourself from the very things that made you who you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't-- I don't want to kill him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we would if you said the word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to kill him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't want to see you being used, either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to be used.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: to echo Nott's point, you are like his peer now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can bamf in and out whenever he wants to!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't. I'm stuck here on this island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look, you made us this amazing dinner out of nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a really good dinner.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've never had pancakes before, and this might be my favorite thing I've ever had.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You really haven't touched your bugs much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I'm eating all the pancakes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, if you roll them up, and...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we're a little bit biased because we've seen you do a lot more amazing things than we've seen the Traveler do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything I do, all of it, is because of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, give yourself some credit, too, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In many ways, you're much more than he will probably ever be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, look at me with Dairon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're way cooler than the Traveler, in my opinion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we leave Dairon at our house, by the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she there for forever? No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or are they still in Rexx--? I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We all think you're pretty amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: a little more time with you will color his perspective instead of he coloring yours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gently push my salad across towards Vilya.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "I've had plenty of salad in recent years."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever had salad with sprinkles, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Basically sugared croutons when you get down to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are they shaped like Mickey ears, these cucumbers? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you get an avocado to do that, even.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the evening is yours to set up as you see fit, whether it be more things to get ready, more conversations to have or setting up the dome and whatever your preparation would be before a night's rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think I would set up the dome, not on the deck, but...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to lay the wand down on the ground and spend, I don't know, maybe 30 minutes to an hour just sort of sliding different pieces of glass around, switching them out, and just pondering a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else need to do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meditate. Listen to the sound of the waterfall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am going to do something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go up to the front of the cavern where the waterfall is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: like, is there a boat that's close by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're looking for a small rock, like a handheld rock?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would have a place to position right near the cavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check as you're rummaging through the nearby sand and dirt that has accumulated at the corner to see if there's any loose stone or rock that you can grab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's sharp on one edge, about that big, but you find one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I still have Tongues up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tongues lasts an hour, I believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, no, that would be gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast, with my Rod of the Solitary Scout, the wand that I have, I'm going to cast Magic Mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here they are, ready for the taking!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I put it right at the edge, so that way, if the dragon turtle comes within range, he'll hear it and be tempted to come on in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel pretty confident that a being of that size, if it were to come through, would definitely trigger the radius for the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A minor thing, I will also stay up at least an hour to use components necessary to turn Frumpkin into an octopus, and I will just frisbee him out off of the ship to patrol while we are sleeping, and to be more use, possibly, tomorrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, I think we're doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing your jade thing again, or leaving it as it was?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we tying each other together or is that a bad idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the jade thing, the plethora of images that you left the night before, did help lower the DC of the check last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am tapped at that level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're tying yourselves together with rope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's affixed to who? Or is it everyone affixed to a singular piece of rope?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do the twice around your wrist, extend it six feet or more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can take it off easily, but it'll wake us up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it'll take, between all of you, two sets of rope, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ripples only came out from where the feather hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go towards the feather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The feather's about four feet from you, about as many footsteps.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: and reach down to pick it up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try to grab it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a wisdom saving throw for me if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because technically, yeah, you do have it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I will stand there and wait for it to hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice once more crackling through the storm says, "Show me--" (thunder rumbling) "You can be reborn." (thunder rumbling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look up towards that hole once more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The words, you can't quite make out, but it's calling to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds very much like Zuala.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I crouch down, and I put my hand out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you would know what time it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wake up, the day is yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'd like everyone to make Wisdom saving throws, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll forget what happened last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because of Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right on this cusp, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the only person that missed by one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But why? Why were you here? And you immediately recognize consciously, like, "Oh no." Oh no. With your intelligence and self-awareness, you know exactly what happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, self-aware of the fact that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of your high intelligence and the preparation you guys have done, you forgetting things, they're fuzzy, and you being you, can acknowledge that something's wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't quite understand what, but just something's not right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, then something's definitely off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which of us wants to take it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. On three, or three then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, that means I lost, so I should use my spell slot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had a very tall, erect spine, and it just went a little... (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were smiling for a second!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We knew you wouldn't like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're much taller than I realized.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm, you know, average human height.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would also like everybody to make an investigation check, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know where you put it, it's weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have all these things listed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have a bunch of things in my inventory that I'm like, "Wait, what?" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think I would ever realize it was missing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At some point I was like, "You definitely need that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a belt with a key attached to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every day, it's got to be like, "(sighs) Another ball bearing."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to get back to the Xhorhaus and be like, (huffing)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do we get in there? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's got a hell of a lost and found section.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rosohna's pretty on top of it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the morning is yours for prep, if you wanted to try and speak to your friend, Dieter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there's no sign of Dieter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should be able to answer it with something reasonable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, why? He said, "Why should I believe you?" Or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, because we're enemies, right? Why should he trust us? This could be a trap for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It definitely is a trap for him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just say, "We have a beef, "but you'd be pissing off one of my enemies."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we want to make amends for our previous transgressions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we did turn him into a little thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you could say we want to sail out of here unscathed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of like the beef angle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "But congratulations, we hate someone else more than you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was four words, we like him less.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't say I was very good at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck him! Like, fuck him! Like, fuck him over! You know, fuck him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I should've used the Tongues thing again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's happening, it's not like an active--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The response comes after a moment, and goes, "We had discussed, "I don't need a mate."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That first roll was so close! I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a tough sell, and it just didn't work out. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're good. We're going to make our way in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go in the back way, he'll know something's up immediately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, what are we going to say? Like, we were just exploring the island?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What difference does it make? We'll bring him stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think some of us should go in the front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we get over there quickly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vilya can take us over there quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've just wasted three fucking spells before we even got in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go in the back, what are we doing? Like, "Hey, we're here to surprise you "with more gifts from your back door "that you told us not to use!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can be like, "Well, you know, "we didn't want to have to go all the way around "so we came this way."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He did seem to be really into "some of the things you were carrying."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (with a mouth full of food) I, um-- These scones are so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we think he'll see through that stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you could also do the astral dreadnought thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make myself look like Lukash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take on the full orcish form of the surprisingly debonair Lukash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he probably doesn't talk to Vokodo anyway, and Vokodo can't hear people, so he doesn't know what he sounds like anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he was paying attention to something else at the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe he just knows our position, but doesn't see our every move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We're like beacons on a map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So there might be something to that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could be just as shocked coming through there as anybody.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Exploring, and one of us got pulled through, and we followed, and...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little more together for it, and here we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in a place, correct me if I'm wrong, where islanders have been forbidden to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this area's been forbidden, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he already knows we're here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just, I guess, lamenting the fact that Dieter did not come.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I'm lamenting that, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not in a great position.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to say no, but I'm just going to throw it out there anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here it comes. Let's have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we need Dieter to destroy some ships? Couldn't we just blow up some fuckin' ships?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would we use to blow up-- Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to preserve the plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could just burn all the ships with fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we bust out the ceiling on here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. And just make it rain rocks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See how many ships we can take out with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would think we would do it from above, because if we're down here, woof.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you blew up two of the ships with-- Do you have any of your-- I don't want to say it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could try and find a great white in the ocean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were going to go fishing for a great white shark?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a good charter that knows where the great white shark hunting ground...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can be a great white shark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you were going to do like, "Here, Dieter, Dieter, Dieter!" with a great white shark or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to figure it out, man! I'm sad about Dieter too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was more than we had.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was a very good idea,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And further proof that he should really get laid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was his decision not to come.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I light a ship on fire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should probably blow up at least two of them, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not at all worried that he's going to unleash the volcano's wrath in retribution?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was just going to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, if we do that, then we can't play off the idea of Vilya going in and saying, like, "Yeah, we're here to offer you some more things." That's out the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say we go in the back door with Vilya saying, "Hey, we came in the back door to give you prizes." Then what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we give him something, or do we just attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He seems to be pretty smart, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could put fluffernutter in some sort of a bowl or something, and we can hand it to him, and then make it blow up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we're in a small confined room with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're trying to see if we get him to come out, right? So it's worth the shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try to blow some things up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which we can breathe, but we're slow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also, we can cast-- Before we do it, I should cast Freedom of Movement, because it lasts for an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: DM, do we remember how long it took us to traverse from the first entrance to where he was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the first entrance, it was about maybe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably about an hour or so of travel, but that's also because you guys were being careful and finding your way as Vilya was leading you at a casual pace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Freedom of Movement at the last minute, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right before we go in, yeah..

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, you do have the residuum for the Glyph of Warding thing you were also talking about last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could use the residuum for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To put a bomb on something, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, if we really want, we can also do a group Water Walk, if anyone's got that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, if we want to just not deal with underwater at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we don't know where we're going to be facing him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But good if he comes here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a couple Freedom of Movements, but it does cut into our Banishment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's just a matter of-- Okay, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somehow, we found ourselves back to... fluffernutter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, unless they're just stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, Vilya, we're hoping you all didn't build Vo in a direct lava flow path, did you? I mean, I guess it doesn't really matter if the whole thing blows, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't build a channel down from the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I also haven't seen the volcano erupt "to its full capabilities."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, you piss off a god and we kill a whole village.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to come see what it is first, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He may ask us what's happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to just commit, go in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he doesn't come out, we go in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, because if he comes, he's going to come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless he can do shit we don't anticipate, which is very likely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know fire damage is the right way to go with a volcano god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to blow him up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just, there was a fluffernutter plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, do you have the ability to send any more messages in case time passes and nothing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The entire chamber fills up with smoke.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I still want the ability to warn a lot of people that we've drawn the wrath of a god upon their heads.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vilya, is there any type of alert system in the village? Do you have anything, anyone, that you can send a message to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do have bells arranged throughout the village "that in case something is coming to attack--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You know, they've got bells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the volcano were to start making noise, would people know to--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They rely on me to keep him calm."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may just have to trust that people are going to act in their own interest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, which, the problem is we don't know what he's going to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) Just think about the greater good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hopefully they're all good at messaging.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I could do-- the Glyph of Warding would use 200 more residuum powder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been here so long, we're going to deplete our resources.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Glyph would only do one attack, right? It's just a few.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 5d8 whatever kind of damage we want it to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The original idea was to have that be that kind of gift thing, but if he's coming, busting out into this boat lot--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever. Should we start blowing up some boats?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cannot believe that I'm in complete agreement over this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When it doubt, blow up a boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my other bomb, my depth charge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to be clever about this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to decide where to put them or just put them willy nilly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to do the fanciest one, right? That's Eden's Horizon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should definitely blow up the Fiona.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was going to say the Fiona too, because Fiona's just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's just a dumb name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a terrible name, I like that name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, the Sea Banshee is fairly nice, and has been taken care well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mistral also is a nice medium-sized, looks like a naval vessel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And which is the furthest from the Vokodo door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The furthest from it would be the Fiona.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to walk on water over to the Fiona and attach my depth charge to it, or just put it on the-- I don't know. Where should I put it, Fjord? Where is going to make the thing burn and sink?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't burned a lot of boats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we want, fire or sink?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you went above decks and went down into the hull and attached it right under the deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and attach it there below the deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then, I mean, I've got to light it on fire or something so it'll explode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far back should we all be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gotta be close, make sure it works, yeah. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess, shall we make some sort of fuse, or just going to throw a Fireball at it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could just lob this over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but it will explode, so we just need to be far enough back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to set it off while you're in the ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yes, I have no fuse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You definitely don't want to be on or near the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could just set the boat on fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it as loud as a depth charge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll set the boat on fire, but we'll leave the depth charge in, and when the fire reaches it, kaboom!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a great knowledge of demolition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so placing the charge onto the upper deck of the deck, you all take a safe distance, and then what do you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just start using Fire Bolt to light this boat and maybe the one next to it on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does take you a while, because, one, it's a moist interior, and looks like a lot of the wood here is somewhat--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) So it takes you a while to get the wood-- (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me more about the wood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once it catches, you can switch to that, and as you do, the flames begin to spread and engulf the exterior and upper deck area of the Fiona.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it begins to burn bright, the interior of the cavern is now being warmly lit in the immediate vicinity of the ship, and you watch as the flames spread and spread and-- (explosion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a goner, and it's just now on fire, and you can see, slowly, it's beginning to capsize a bit to one side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I look over to Yasha and say: Once you burn one ship, it's kind of hard to stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can all hide or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as certain small elements of rock and stone begin to (splashing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this roof going to collapse?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You put the roof on us? Should we get in the bubble?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, it's fine, take cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got a pearl on my head and I'm starting to cast Fortune's Favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make sure I'm standing next to Beau, and you should make sure you're standing next to Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship is now burning and slowly, (bubbling) it is sort of sinking, and it's hitting the edge of the sand bank, so it's sinking and beginning to tumble to the side to find itself to a deeper portion of the cavern, which now puts flames partially obscuring the exit from where the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I put my hand in the water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the water feel the same temperature as before, or warmer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, the water feels same temperature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get down and kneel down on the deck of whatever boat we're on right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to try use Divine Intervention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To get the Traveler's attention here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to do? What are you asking for with the Divine Intervention?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to ask the Traveler to help us get Vokodo out of his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really feel like I messed everything up with--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) We are going to peg Vokodo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's close, but it's too high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should you be like, "Oh, shit! "They're destroying all the boats in Heaven's Falls, oh no!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: very faint flames licking up the sides of her forearms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coasts past the flames of the sinking ship, the Fiona, and heads through the illusion to the side, best she can, of the waterfall, and vanishes out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great. We're never going to see her again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She just said it was a really bad idea to go through that thing as a bird, and then she did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hoping that Caleb has had enough time, a minute, to cast Fortune's Favor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's time to go--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to get him out of here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be very hot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) So why are we going to go in, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember he got mad and it started to get a little warm?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to lie? Are we going to say, like, "Oh, it was crazy! "It was crazy! Someone's destroying your ships! "We tried to stop them!" Or...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going in, and we've got five minutes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or do we say fuck it, and we try to keep destroying the ships, and hope he'll come out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many boats are on fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should blow up more boats?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like he'd let them all burn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. If people start smashing your shit, and you've got 20 of something and they only break one, you're like, "Eh, not so bad."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halfway through there, you're like, "Fuck it!" Unlocking the door and coming out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if he's trapped in the volcano and he can't come out no matter how hard he wants to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's stuck in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to smoke another boat, or we going in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. (laughs) You guys look over and just already just lobbing Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to leave that and move to another one? What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will until someone tells me different.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't need these ships. He does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has anything changed at all in the 10 minutes that Caleb spent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it begins to burn, you hear and feel another (rumbling) another heavy reverberance, almost like an explosion from the outside, and you all can feel and hear it from the inside of this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's just like a uranium rod that's overreacting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we got to go in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, we don't have to go in. (laughs) We could just go outside and wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could just leave everyone here to die. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Vilya can step through a tree, take us to another continent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rumbling continuing. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever wanted to go to Wildemount?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long did we say it took to get through the tunnels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the other side, it was about an hour, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This side, we don't know how long it takes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know long it will take from this side.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: And extend my hand out, holding a cocoon in my hand, and I'm going to cast Polymorph on him, on Vokodo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got it. That's a which save?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And turn him into a dragon turtle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you come through and release it, one of the eyes looks towards you, and as the spell impacts, you see its form quake for a second and then resist it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, I need you to make a wisdom save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that first one that wasn't cocked was an 18 anyway, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you cast Polymorph, the effect blasts off his hide, and then reforms towards Beauregard and Beauregard, you suddenly resist an effect that's maybe trying to change and alter your physical form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that something that can happen, that spell can ricochet off of a--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With him? Is that with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And to that point, actually, just double-check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This guy's got a lot of tricks up his sleeve, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, if you can go ahead and make a charisma save for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would've been really funny to see you turn into a giant crab, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your movement, that's your action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You good? All right, Caleb's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are now back to the lair action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a lair action, he gets a free Misty Step and is going to teleport 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way. As part of the lair action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a spell, it's a lair action, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got Sentry on his ass, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a lair action, it gets to cast, so it is a spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still get to make an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah--! Oh, it's fine. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as he vanishes, and then suddenly this tiny little sparkle of fire goes across the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it comes to Vilya's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she can do quite well over here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When is he up? When is Vokodo's turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head seems to dip down and the storm above goes (crackling, lightning striking) and strikes down next towards Vokodo, who fails his Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to finish her go there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still trying to figure out what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every one of you within the chamber takes three points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got to do better than that, Vokodo!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We want you to die, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He swims to the base of the chamber, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So does that mean melee attacks on it have advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to go ahead and end his turn since it's all he can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the attacking Yasha break the charm on her, because she took physical damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah, yes, go ahead and make another save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wouldn't it break it already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't break it. She gets to save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She gets a save because of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get a wisdom save with advantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still there staring forward towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Vokodo's turn, currently prone on the ground, Commanded by a level one spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Absorbed by what's in front of you, eyes wide, hypnotized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, you can make another series of saves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, here we go. This is it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it's not! It's a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Jester, with Veth on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I got to come up with something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have my duplicate swim towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can, because she's not altered by the speed of the water, she can get almost 10 feet away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to cast-- Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, can you point to where Yasha is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right in the front of the face, just staring into the open mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Command again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the save on that? That's wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action, and your bonus to move it, so you have your movement still if you want to move at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to swim around-- (babbling) the base of where Fjord is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to swim as far around it as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get, unless you want to go up or down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay up so I can see him just above the edge of that-- Yeah, I can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all good. I'll put you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he won't get over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, you're up. Caduceus, you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I do? Oh, what do I do? I got to get within 30 feet, but he's moved 30 feet away, and I can only swim 15 feet, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I need to make a wisdom save or something to make sure it didn't do anything to somebody else? The Command spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're getting a ricochet spell again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester was about to shout a word, and for a second your concentration shifts towards her, and you shake it from your will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grovel? Really? You want me to grovel right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, I wasn't going to say grovel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't get within range, so I will-- Can I make it up to that thing that Fjord was behind before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right on top here, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get over here is about as far as you can get, which is partial cover.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I hide behind something over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can try and hide there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll bonus action hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Magical Ambush! If I'm hidden when I cast a spell, the creature has disadvantage on saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. Wow, you haven't ever done that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Disadvantage on saving throws for the rest of the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I will cast Phantasmal Force on It,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, maybe he's extra-susceptible to it since all he does is communicate with mind images.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what is the DC on that, and what kind of save is it? Is it wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so rolled an 18, and the lower number, with its bonus, is a 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it will see a giant black portal, 10 feet wide open up in front of it, accompanied by the sound of nightmarish howls from an Abyss-like plane, so it's like (warped growling) and it will hear, in Common, anyway, "I'm coming for you!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay. Does it take any damage from this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could take-- It can take psychic damage, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, does the spell do damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, but it seems to-- It says if the effect seems like it would injure them, they can take a 1d6--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it doesn't seem like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- you are a strong halfling woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes shoot there, and its entire body goes-- (snarling) and you can see fear on its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it get to save every round?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "While the target is affected by the spell..." Blah blah blah blah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far forward would I have to walk to be within 30 feet of Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be within 30 feet of Yasha from where you are, which is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would need to go your full movement, or close to it. 10 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'll do-- I'm going to try and get as centered as I am to get everyone-- as many people, within a 30-foot radius, as possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And do I get Beau in that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matty, it says that it can use its action to investigate it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many people do I think are in range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You think everybody could possibly be in range, but you wouldn't know until you actually check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast then at...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, Grog got mind controlled all the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm casting Bless on six people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I was hoping to go one step diagonal or two step diagonal just to get a little closer to Beau and be not right behind phantom Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean one step, that diagonal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the other way. The other way. Yeah, there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So moving there, you get everybody except for Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, everyone has a d4 added to saves and attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It was either you... yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a d4 to Wisdom saving throws?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm still smiling, even though I'm going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every saving throw, every attack. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attacks and saves have a d4.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't like where I am, but what am I going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to float up from behind the platform, only so that my eyes crest the top so that I can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I am going to spot the portal that is being conjured by Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have no idea what Veth did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I track where his eyes are cowering from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- it's just on the ground groveling and getting up, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could have pulled a barlgura through the illusion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was what I said I was going to do before the fight, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you have done it anyway, is the question?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, I made an illusion like we discussed! (laughter) Like we texted about a minute ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to be all meta about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put him in prison. Meta prison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been wondering why you haven't pulled anything out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you were going to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just won't know where to do it from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In this area, because it's the biggest open space, I'm going to use Major Image, and I'm going to conjure a 20-foot by 20-foot Astral dreadnought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That looks like it's burning with the same sort of glowing fire that Vokodo has.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just so that it pushes him back towards you and away from most of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How-- for comparison, how big was the astral dreadnought that we went into the mouth of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The astral dreadnought that you went in the mouth of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was between 20 and 25 feet wide on any side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or a little bit larger than him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or, once again, just very far away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and it lets out a terrifying astral dreadnought bellow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just a thousand t-rexes pitched down a couple decibels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, keep that in mind for whatever role playing purposes there might be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. Beauregard, you're up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are right now, yeah, 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Punch Him in the Face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes an action. Right? Does it take an action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was a free action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess it doesn't take an action, does it? So I can just do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not taken an action before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't specify that it takes an action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it hasn't previously, we'll let it go for the purposes of this battle, but I should've said that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would've been a waste of a turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll probably make it a bonus action going forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, wait, I rolled! Oh, no, I rolled, and I just picked up the dice that I rolled! I'm rolling again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage, by the way, because he is prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hasn't had his turn yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, then, I will take that seven with that plus four, thanks Caduceus, to make it 21 total.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double the chances for a nat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Burning through all my ki points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Another Flurry of Blows? Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yikes. God, I'm getting really low.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you only have a certain number of punches every day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolling with advantage on each of those too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, it's a lot of dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's another eight for another 14 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even though...? Oh, yeah, you are making contact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's starting to hurt real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So take your 22 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Definitely some third-degree burns in some areas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb will swim around that column a bit to try to get as close as possible, and start weaving his hands in the water, and muttering arcane words and say, I have an offering for you! And I will pull out my middle finger and say you make a shitty god, you bedazzled cephalopod! And I will cast Banishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not his best save, but I rolled high on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, make a Charisma saving throw, plus a d4.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, do I have to because I'm in the vicinity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, as you're right there, fists burning, you get this weird sensation, like this weird sparkling around your torso, and then suddenly darkness, and you are adrift on this endless sea of sparkling gossamer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) It is cold and you are alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see distant little clusters of looks like floating rocks, slowly rotating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature, now getting back up into its space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to go ahead and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mean the giant portal or the giant mini dreadnought?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It wastes its lair action on your illusion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the direction of your illusion and your illusion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I was in that, but I'm already hypnotized.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it discern anything about the illusions or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think it has to touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vilya's going to go ahead and swim, over as this orca, over here to get a visual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, she almost knocked me over!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is going to-- (impact) bring the bolt down onto Vokodo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like to picture the killer whale's little fin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it does succeed on the save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, she rolled a one? How did that miss it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apple doesn't fall far from the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's exactly her spell DC, so you take half damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they both take half damage, or no?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ Keyleth's mom don't got it going on ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't take any damage from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not if he makes the save on something for half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 14 points of lightning damage, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, I need both Veth and Jester to also make Dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so far away from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't let this NPC die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, we're next to Fjord though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are both within five feet of Fjord, and it struck Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to get her to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed and take no damage because of your Evasion ability.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, how much did you take again? You took...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. 28 points lightning damage to you, Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. It did more to her than me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vilya, at this point, the orca goes-- (orca wailing) and gives this baleful sorry sound throughout the water that all of you hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to use its action to try and discern whatever it is you're opening there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's going to attempt to move back with its movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So now that it's discerned, my thing's dead, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This might change things, because you're holding the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was, but I think once he discerns that it's false...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but if you fail your concentration check, the spell would have faded before it came to his turn, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, pulling back, he's going to go ahead and swim backward 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. That'll put him back about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take your attack of opportunity, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, your guys' teamwork fucked up his round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, and everybody at the top of his turn, sorry--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes four points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that from the water heating up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't wait for Beau's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No boiling water in the middle of fucking nowhere!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That puts you right about there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you dash to get up there as well, so you are right up in his face.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you use the d4 for--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But that foolishness fades and goes immediate into this deep, deep anger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up, and Veth, you're on deck.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so I can't move from there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, that's the end of your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Got it, got it, got it. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take a cue from Caleb-- (claps) and I'm going to have my duplicate swim up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And pull out a little duplicate sequinsed glove, and wave it around and be like, here's your other offering! (blows raspberry) And cast Banishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use his last Legendary Resistance to resist it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would've been funny if it was me and him hanging out in the Abyss, though. (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He just bamfs right next to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Yasha, I need you to make a Charisma saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Yasha? He would choose Yasha? He wouldn't choose Veth or something, because...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought your Charisma was high but then I realized yours is also low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instead he's going to go ahead and Caduceus, make a Charisma saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't done shit. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where is Cad on the board? I don't see him on there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 for me, Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure how far away, but it is getting slowly bigger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I don't see him anywhere? We are not in the same--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! That would've been fun at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are 700 light years away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Jester, that finish your turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're not moving at all? You're staying put?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to get as close as I can, because everything's moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dash 15 feet. (laughing) I can't do anything from farther than 30, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will also use my action to go another 15 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you are out in the middle of nowhere, with this strange, looming shadow coming towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I move? Am I on solid ground, or...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're just floating in space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Floating in space, and there's a weird shadow coming at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have been in a similar space before in the Happy Fun Ball, and you do recall when you were there that you just willed yourself in a direction and you floated where you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and find some cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start gliding towards it, and it gets ever so slightly bigger, and with the little bit of movement you go, "Ah, it's like a half-mile away." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it works great, I'm telling you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that Ian McKellen? I can't tell if it's six feet tall, or...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Til you realize it's just a toe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way I can just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back to earth, is there? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Banishment on yourself? Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who knows where I'll show up, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't pinpoint target where I'm going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He makes the hobbits look so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it was me, I'd stay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's his last, I think. Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to hold a, uh-- Sacred Flame in case anything tries to do anything to me, but I'm going to try and just keep chill and quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'm checking one thing real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'm just going to cast Resistance on myself and just try and chill.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a bonus to a saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I choose to take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
